title.narrative: SDG SYSTEM & EQUITY ANALYSIS

description.narrative: By 2021, integration of national data and information systems is improved, ensuring generation of evidence for monitoring equity and policy-making for children (high quality disaggregated data and information)., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses (Covid), Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Reducing Child Poverty, Reducing Child Poverty (Covid), Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, increased inclusiveness and equity for children in national plans and policies, guided by improved budget, knowledge and data.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2021, integration of national data and information systems is improved, ensuring generation of evidence for monitoring equityand policy-making for children (high quality disaggregated data and information).

description.narrative: In partnership with the National Statistical Office (NSO), the provincial-level data of MICS 6 was launched for the 17 most disadvantaged provinces including the 5 southernmost provinces. UNICEF provided technical inputs and support to the preparation for the two major national household surveys of MICS 7 and Disability Survey to take place in 2022. For the first time, UNICEF led the child-related SDG indicator assessment reporting by bringing NSOs as the data/evidence providers and supported the NESDC as SDG coordination function/policy planning closely working together on the areas of SDGs data on children.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/01/2022
